> Kup and grimlok nodded and said "What location do you suggest?"

Legacy turned only slightly to look at Kup and Grimlock, "MY SENSORS ARE PICKING UP READINGS OF WHAT COULD BE A CLASS 1 GEOLOGICAL EVENT." 

Legacy continued into the air via some sort of anti-gravity propulsion. "ANYWHERE BUT THIS IMMEDIATE VICINITY WOULD BE BEST." Legacy spoke from a position now decidedly above Kup and Grimlock. Meanwhile noxious vapors and hot winds began to pour out of the newly expanded hole that Megatron had made.

(TAG: Grimlock, Kup, Megatron)

Preston
